ProductInfo.Features:
Wireless Bluetooth Mini Speaker with Built-in Microphone|Micro SD card slot.
Voice Prompt when Connected|Disconnected.
Simply the smallest-best bass sounding wireless speaker with metal case design-top grade and in style.
Ability to produce extreme high (tweeter) and low (woofer) frequencies from a single bass.
Output capacity of 95 decibels - music fills even the largest rooms.
Build-in Lion-battery and can be rechargeable by USB power.
Able to play music continuously about 5-7 hours.
Metal case design-top grade and in style.
Ultra-simple style design with compact size: 3 x 3 x 2.4 inches.
Comply with Bluetooth-RF range is up to 10M.
Hand rope design for easy portability.
Simple pairing with your iPhone-iPad-iPod touch-Android-BlackBerry and other devices-watching movies-playing games is a real enjoyment!
Audio jack work with iPhone-iPod-phone and other player and laptop.
Hands-free with microphone design for mobile phone user-allow you to mute the music to answer a call directly from the headphones.
100% Customer Satisfaction. Fast Same-Day Shipping by 12:00 PM PDT.
30-Day Money Back Guarantee. 12 Months Warranty. Exclusive $100000 Product Protection Plan!
Satisfies Government - School - Health care enterprise and Corporate account purchase order requirements.
